abstract: Brimming with more than more than 1700 references, this reader-friendly and extensively revised Fourth Edition will prove invaluable to instructors and students alike-providing a unified approach to the anatomical, physiological, and perceptual aspects of audition with updated chapters on the latest developments in the field.
meta: Publisher: Hearing: An Introduction to Psychological and Physiological AcousticsISBN: 9780429139727
